nodes.bodyText: This test appears unrelated to the issue, and also passes on master without any modifications to the plugin.
My bad, published the wrong version.
Are you sure this is correct? I think message always has to be messageNode.getValue()?
Good callout, they're the same, so I changed back to using just message.
Moving removeFormattingTags is fine, but should be in a separate commit since it is unrelated.
